meta.title: An Overview of the Lectures & Speeches Speech Type

nodes.body:
Lectures and speeches include academic lectures, political speeches, motivational speeches, and other types of verbal presentation which are persuasive or educational in intent and are delivered by a single individual to a larger group of people.

The Open Language Archives Community (OLAC) standards instead refers to this as "oratory."
